paragraphs.name: 80a6
paragraphs.text: Regressive morons like these guys are handing the 2020 election to Donald J Trump on a silver platter. The Left (of which I consider myself a member) hasn’t learned anything from their loss in November. Even if Trump burns the Republican Party to the ground it still doesn’t mean the Democrats will win (remember Bush 2004).

29965a12d1c0.title: Just created an account so that I could comment on how turned off I was by this article.

paragraphs.text: Just created an account so that I could comment on how turned off I was by this article. I took a few months off from The Ringer after the the election. I popped back in today to hear a 27 year old Brandeis graduate in a tweed jacket with a faked British accent tell me that he is afraid of sounding American, the alt-right is Nazism, and that he is…

paragraphs.name: d20e
paragraphs.text: May be trite to say it, since it’s been pointed out by many, but it’s none the less true, Americans don’t know much history, even their own. At several points in US history the latest being 1930–1950, the positions taken by these so called “hard” left publications were widely accepted as normal and correct. The current turn right began in earnest in…

paragraphs.text: The rise of the Limbaugh left. Democrats realize a few decades late that the key to winning elections is keeping your voters angry at all times. Congratulations.

paragraphs.text: Just finished listening to Jane Mayer interview on NPR. She did a piece for the New Yorker on the Mercers, a super rich hedge fund family who helped Trump in August, as his campaign was floundering after the Manafort fiasco. It made me cry to think that there are a handful of rich idiots running our country right now. Mind you, it’s not like Hillary…

paragraphs.name: 790d
paragraphs.text: The hard left will be the end of freedom and human progress, it is a hydra many heads no intelligence. it also does not understand how to use it’s propensity for violence in a coherent manner. I hope many people will read Orwell’s “Animal Farm” that is how you arrive at “1984” and is exactly what the left is aiming for.
